name: Karyuujou
overview: Karyujyou (also known as Karyuu Jou) is an romantic adventure game based on a popular chinese novel, in the game the player takes control of 2 different characters (Ryu on the first cd of the game and Yuyu in the second cd). The game takes place in the Ancient China, and uses a 3d polygon engine and the gameplay is walking around the port town of Ningbo and talk to different characters to advance in the game, there will times in the games where the player can choose what to answer and that will take the story in a way or another.
